summary.span: 取得或設定可產生欄與資料來源中屬性之關聯的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.

value.span: 物件，表示資料行的資料繫結。

span.span: The object that represents the data binding for the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓指定的資料格屬性的資料行要繫結。The property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's to bind to. 如需繫結路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 繫結路徑語法 」 一節[繫結宣告概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)。For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md).
